meta.title: Historical Milestones
meta.description: Key developments in AI that move the hands toward midnight.

timeline.title: Reasoning-First Models
timeline.description: OpenAI o3 and xAI Grok 3 emphasize extended reasoning and tool use for complex tasks.

timeline.title: Deliberate Reasoning Models
timeline.description: OpenAI o1-preview introduces models trained to spend more time reasoning, boosting performance on complex math, coding, and science tasks.

timeline.title: Text-to-Video Leap
timeline.description: OpenAI Sora and Google DeepMind Veo push text-to-video and image-conditioned generation.

timeline.title: Apple Intelligence Launch
timeline.description: Apple rolls out Apple Intelligence across iPhone, iPad, and Mac with on-device and private-cloud processing for privacy-preserving AI at consumer scale.

timeline.title: AlphaFold 3 for Biomolecular Systems
timeline.description: DeepMind and Isomorphic Labs introduce AlphaFold 3, expanding prediction to interactions among proteins, DNA/RNA, and small molecules.

timeline.title: Efficient Small LLMs
timeline.description: Microsoft's Phi-3 shows strong performance from small, local-capable models.

timeline.title: Multimodal + Long-Context Frontier
timeline.description: GPT-4o, Claude 3, and Gemini 1.5 deliver real-time multimodal interaction and long-context reasoning.

timeline.title: Llama 3 Open Frontier
timeline.description: Meta releases Llama 3 open-weight models, raising the capability and reach of the open LLM ecosystem.

timeline.title: Enterprise RAG + Hybrid Models
timeline.description: Cohere's Command R and AI21's Jamba prioritize production-scale RAG and efficient hybrid architectures for long-context workloads.

timeline.title: Blackwell AI Infrastructure
timeline.description: NVIDIA's Blackwell platform targets trillion-parameter-scale training and dramatically lower inference cost, reshaping AI infrastructure.

timeline.title: Asia's Frontier LLM Wave
timeline.description: Baidu (ERNIE 4.0), Alibaba (Tongyi Qianwen 2.0), Tencent (Hunyuan), Huawei (Pangu 3.0), Naver (HyperCLOVA X), and Samsung (Gauss) launch major regional LLMs, globalizing the frontier race.

timeline.title: Embodied AI Models
timeline.description: PaLM-E and RT-2 connect language models to robots and embodied control.

timeline.title: Agentic Tool Use
timeline.description: ReAct formalizes reasoning-and-acting with tools, and AutoGPT popularizes autonomous task loops.

timeline.title: Frontier LLM Competition
timeline.description: Anthropic Claude 2, Google Gemini 1.0, and xAI Grok expand the frontier race.

timeline.title: GPT-4 & Multimodal Reasoning
timeline.description: GPT-4 advances benchmark performance and multimodal reasoning.

timeline.title: MoE Open Models
timeline.description: Mistral releases Mixtral 8x7B, an open-weight sparse mixture-of-experts model that delivers strong performance with efficient inference.

timeline.title: Open-Weight LLMs Accelerate
timeline.description: Meta's Llama 2 and Mistral 7B make strong open-weight models broadly available.

timeline.title: Foundation Models Go Cloud-Scale
timeline.description: Amazon Bedrock becomes generally available, offering managed access to multiple foundation models, including Amazon Titan, and accelerating enterprise adoption.

timeline.title: ChatGPT Launch
timeline.description: ChatGPT brings conversational LLMs to mass adoption and everyday workflows.

timeline.title: Text-to-Image Goes Mainstream
timeline.description: DALL-E 2, Imagen, and Stable Diffusion bring high-fidelity text-to-image generation to wide use.

timeline.title: PaLM Scales LLMs
timeline.description: Google's PaLM scales LLMs with the Pathways architecture, pushing capability and breadth.

timeline.title: Chinchilla Scaling Laws
timeline.description: Compute-optimal scaling demonstrates that training on far more data, not just bigger models, drives better performance.

timeline.title: Instruction Tuning + RLHF
timeline.description: InstructGPT shows that reinforcement learning from human feedback can make LLMs follow instructions far more reliably.

timeline.title: Codex Powers Copilot
timeline.description: OpenAI Codex powers GitHub Copilot, bringing AI code generation into mainstream developer workflows.

timeline.title: CLIP + DALL-E Foundations
timeline.description: OpenAI's CLIP links text and images, and DALL-E demonstrates early text-to-image generation.

timeline.title: AlphaFold2 Breakthrough
timeline.description: DeepMind's AlphaFold2 reaches near-experimental protein structure accuracy, signaling AI impact in science.

timeline.title: GPT-3 Released
timeline.description: OpenAI's GPT-3 shows strong few-shot language capability at scale, setting the modern LLM baseline.

timeline.title: Transformer Architecture
timeline.description: Transformers change natural language processing and enable large-scale language models.

timeline.title: AlphaGo Defeats Lee Sedol
timeline.description: AlphaGo defeats Lee Sedol, revealing creative search and intuition-like play.

timeline.title: Deep Learning Revolution
timeline.description: AlexNet wins ImageNet and sparks the modern deep-learning wave.

timeline.title: Deep Blue Defeats Kasparov
timeline.description: IBM's Deep Blue defeats Garry Kasparov, proving machines can surpass humans in chess.

timeline.title: ELIZA
timeline.description: ELIZA shows early language processing and how quickly people attribute understanding to machines.

timeline.title: Dartmouth Conference
timeline.description: At Dartmouth, John McCarthy and others coin the term Artificial Intelligence and launch the field.

timeline.title: The Turing Test
timeline.description: Alan Turing proposes the imitation game, a practical test for machine intelligence.
